name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with extensive experience in **manual testing**, **API testing**, and utilizing tools such as **Postman**, **TestRail**, and **BrowserStack** to ensure high-quality software delivery. Proficient in **SQL** and adept in **Java** and **JavaScript** for effective collaboration with development teams. Proven track record in streamlining CI/CD processes using **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions**, resulting in enhanced automation and deployment efficiencies. Strong capabilities in problem-solving and communication complemented by expertise in **Jira**, **Confluence**, and **Slack** for effective project management. Recognized for contributions across various sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, demonstrating a commitment to deliver user-centric and reliable applications.

experience.responsibilities:
Conducted **API testing** and **manual testing** on microservices architects using **Postman**, ensuring comprehensive test coverage and achieving a **95%** defect identification rate.
Collaborated with development teams utilizing **Jira** for issue tracking and **Confluence** for documentation, enhancing interdepartmental communication by **25%**.
Implemented and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, resulting in a **80%** reduction in deployment times and increasing release frequency.
Executed performance testing and monitoring using **SQL** and **Graylog**, providing actionable insights that led to a **30%** improvement in system reliability.
Utilized **BrowserStack** for cross-browser testing, ensuring compliance with **WCAG** standards for accessibility across **9+** different browsers.
Led a team of testers in developing standardized testing protocols within **TestRail**, improving efficiency and clarity in test case execution.
Fostered a collaborative environment through effective **communication** and **problem-solving** strategies, ultimately reducing defect leakage to production by **40%**.

• Conducted **manual testing** and **API testing** to ensure high-quality software deliverables, closely collaborating with development teams on **Java** and **JavaScript** applications.
• Utilized **Postman** for API testing, achieving a **99%** test coverage rate on critical endpoints.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitHub Actions** to automate testing processes, reducing time to market by **30%**.
• Developed SQL queries for backend database validation, enhancing data integrity across applications by **15%**.
• Managed test documentation through **TestRail** and maintained project updates in **Jira** and **Confluence**, fostering effective communication.
• Leveraged **BrowserStack** for cross-browser testing, identifying compatibility issues and improving user experience across platforms.
• Conducted performance monitoring using **Graylog**, solving problems efficiently to meet business requirements and maintain user satisfaction.

• Conducted **manual testing** and **API testing** for backend REST APIs to ensure robust functionality and achieve a bug-free release.
• Utilized **Postman** for API validation and **Jira** for tracking software bugs, enhancing project transparency.
• Executed SQL queries to verify database interactions effectively with **PostgreSQL**, ensuring data integrity.
• Collaborated with development teams to utilize **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** for a seamless **CI/CD** pipeline, improving deployment frequency by **30%**.
• Spearheaded testing initiatives using **JUnit** and **Mockito**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in bugs and enhancing overall software quality.
• Improved test documentation and reporting in **TestRail** and facilitated team communication via **Slack** and **Confluence** to streamline feedback loops.
• Actively engaged in cross-browser testing with **BrowserStack** to ensure compliance with **WCAG** standards across various platforms.
• Implemented problem-solving strategies to identify and address potential issues, enhancing team efficiency and project delivery timelines.
